text: 2.22: Ais 11.1 naŋga, 53.2 naŋga, Mk 1.24 naŋga, Lu 2.39 naŋga, Jo 1.45Hara, Arkelaus nɨŋuva Herotɨndu upɨ mɨŋata pɨrɨvɨsa Judiandu aru miku mɨŋga kɨyɨ vahu Josep indarɨta kandɨhambu uhuhurɨm pɨŋitumi.2.22 Aru miku Herot kɨmutatɨhi, Rom hati nuŋandɨ pɨrɨvɨsa haŋɨnɨŋ nuŋandɨ ñɨŋisɨmɨŋ tɨŋgɨrumu. Kamatɨhu Arkelaus pɨrɨvɨsa Samaria naŋga Judiandu aru miku yɨvurahami. Kamata aru miku 10 simbi kɨyɨmi.  Hara Aru nɨma akwɨsɨhuyɨ Josepɨŋ nandɨ indarɨmit ha kandɨ vamba ambami. Kamavahi yahata pɨrɨvɨsa Galili umu.
